metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24279 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: The package madlib-object-utils before 0.1.8 are vulnerable to Prototype Pollution via the setValue method, as it allows an attacker to merge object prototypes into it. *Note:* This vulnerability derives from an incomplete fix of [CVE-2020-7701](https://security.snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-MADLIBOBJECTUTILS-598676)

criterions.comment: madlib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
